description: Large 3 bdrm in the Burnaby Lake area. Close to all recreation facilities and ideal for young families. Tastefully updated 3 bdrm 2 bathrooms and a powder room on main,  w/ S-facing garden area. Main floor is open & bright w/ laminated flooring & vaulted ceilings. Bsmt contains recreation room, laundry & storage & upper level contains 3 bdrms including ensuite. Rec facilities include pool, sauna & club house. Don't miss this Burnaby Lake gem. Easy to show by appointment.
